title: Protection device
fullText:
Batteries and associated wiring shall be protected against overload and short circuit by means of fuses or circuit breakers in each unearthed pole. Each battery bank shall be protected via an independent protective device.
NOTE 1 Multiple batteries connected in series or parallel may be considered one battery bank.
NOTE 2 An unearthed pole is a conductor in a d.c circuit that is not connected to earth.
